alert.note: Alert for San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands; Santa Barbara County South Coast; Santa Cruz and Anacapa Islands (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 15 at 10:36PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...TSUNAMI ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT FOR COASTAL AREAS OF SAN LUIS OBISPO AND WESTERN SANTA BARBARA COUNTIES... ...TSUNAMI ADVISORY CANCELED FOR THE SANTA BARBARA SOUTH COAST AND THE CHANNEL ISLANDS... ...TSUNAMI ADVISORY HAS BEEN CANCELED... * UPDATES... No further tsunami danger exists, however some areas may continue to experience small sea level changes. As local conditions can cause a wide variation in tsunami wave action, the all clear determinations must be made by local authorities. This will be the final statement issued for the local area for this event.

area.areaDesc: San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands; Santa Barbara County South Coast; Santa Cruz and Anacapa Islands
